english.segment1: Sex is currency. She sells cars, She sells magazines. Addictive bittersweet, crack your hands, with the hopeless nicotines
english.segment2: Everyone's a lost romantic, Since our love became a kissing show. Everyone's a cassanova, Come and pass me the mistletoe
english.segment3: Everyone's been scared to death of dying here alone
english.segment4: She is easier to love. It's easier to lie. It's easier to fake and smile and brag
english.segment5: It's easier leave. It's easier to lie. It's harder to face ourselves at night. Feeling alone, What have we done?. What is the monster we've become?
english.segment7: Sex is industry, The CEO, of corporate policy. Skin-deep ministry, Suburban youth, hailing so-called liberty
english.segment8: Every advertising antic, I've been a ways with a neon glow. War and love become pedantic, We wage love with a mistletoe
english.segment9: Everyone's been scared to death of dying here alone
english.segment10: She is easier to love. It's easier to lie. It's easier to fake and smile and brag
english.segment11: It's easier leave. It's easier to lie. It's harder to face ourselves at night. Feeling alone, What have we done?. What is the monster we've become?
english.segment13: It's easier to love, It's easier to love
english.segment14: It's easier to love, It's easier to love
english.segment15: She is easier to love, It's easier to, love
english.segment16: Everyone's been scared to death of, Everyone's been scared to death of, Everyone's been scared to death of dying here alone, alone
english.segment17: [Sing]. It's easier to love, It's easier to love, It's easier to fake and smile and brag
english.segment18: It's easier to leave, It's easier to lie, It's harder to face ourselves at night. Feeling alone, What have we done?. What is the monster we've become?
english.segment19: Where is my soul? (Where is my?). Where is my soul?
